list-item.p: Abstracts or papers for which the full texts are unavailable.
Documents that claim that the evidence does not support a signal or that no signal was detected.

Signals that are communicated in the same or similar form or substance more than once by the same stakeholder (only the first signal in chronological order will be considered, if no new information appears in subsequent reports).
Non-English documents and websites for which a translation is unavailable.
